original_text: Why is my language not clear to you? Because you are unable to hear what I say.
korean_text: 어찌하여 내 말을 깨닫지 못하느냐 이는 내 말을 들을 줄 알지 못함이로다

sentences.original_text: Why is my language not clear to you?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 내 말이 너희에게 분명하지 아니하냐?

sentences.original_text: Because you are unable to hear
